name: GlitchSwitch (respawner, ThatAmuzak, loOp Interactive)
description:
A simple puzzle game of buttons and doors. Resetting the level won't reset your progress!

PLEASE READ!

Everytime you reset the level, you drop a glitched clone of yourself where you reset. You can shift places with this clone at will, as much as you want! While resetting will reset the level, you will be able to teleport to where you had reset and continue from there. Beware: side effects of solving these puzzles include becoming way too smart, seeing the future, and ĝ̸̹̺̮̍̄̏̾̕͝l̷̢̧̘͇͓̱͈̏ǐ̸̹͇̚t̸̬͙̲̞̟̲̿c̶̹̺̗͂̾̃̀h̷̦̜̭͓̾́ 

Controls: 

WASD to move around

Click on buttons to open the connected doors

Press R to Reset the level

Resetting will create a glitched clone of you

Press tab to switch positions with the glitched clone
